item.title: Setting player equipment
item.dc:creator: @revengr revengr
item.description:
@revengr wrote:

Try this…

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("eags"))
{
playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = 35;
playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon] = 1;
setEquipment(35, 1, playerWeapon);
}

Do you want it to take the ags out of your inventory, or do you want it to spawn in the weapon slot?

Read full topic

item.title: Setting player equipment
item.dc:creator: @yeoldhag yeoldhag
item.description:
@yeoldhag wrote:

Im trying to make a command that sets the player equipment, just been testing around.
Came up with this, supposed to equip an AGS. Doesn’t do anyhting.

if(comand.equalsIgnoreCase(eags)) {
setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[35], 1, playerWeapon);
playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon] = 1;
}

Does any one know how to do what I’m trying to do?

Read full topic
